title: Minecraft奔溃【Need Help】
author: 游侠XD
txt_content:
Minecraft启动器开起来没事，但是一点击“多人游戏”瞬间奔溃。然后就出现了日志文件。
  P.S：点击单人游戏可以玩

日志内容如下：


# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x3904161b, pid=9276, tid=0x000023f0
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_144-b01) (build 1.8.0_144-b01)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (25.144-b01 mixed mode windows-x86 )
# Problematic frame:
# C  [LonlifeLSP.dll+0x161b]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
  我重装过JAVA，但是就改了一下路径，听说还要改什么环境参数，小白表示不会...

求精通JAVA大神帮助，谢谢了

replies.author: 游侠XD
replies.txt_content:
Need help pls
一个Poter不能没有多人游戏...

replies.author: 下路ADC
replies.txt_content:
卸载java并安装java 8u162,你的版本比较老
不要覆盖安装，路径和变量不是问题

replies.author: 下路ADC
replies.txt_content: 建议不要更改路经，毕竟jre就80多M，这可以解决很多问题

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
你在用Super Network Tunnel吗？
感觉是这东西出现了崩溃，试试看更新到最新版或者直接禁用。

replies.author: gamerteam
replies.txt_content:
之前也有一个人问过
玲珑加速器的问题，重置一下LSP就可以解决
常用的安全软件都有重置/修复LSP的功能

replies.author: 喵不哩南瓜
replies.txt_content: 你电脑多少位？你安装的JAVA多少位？
